title: Stable optical vortices in nonlinear multicore fibers
title_cn: 非线性多芯光纤中的稳定光学涡旋
abstract: The multicore fiber (MCF) is a physical system of high practical importance. In addition to standard exploitation, MCFs may support discrete vortices that carry orbital angular momentum suitable for spatial-division multiplexing in high-capacity fiber-optic communication systems. These discrete vortices may also be attractive for high-power laser applications. We present the conditions of existence, stability, and coherent propagation of such optical vortices for two practical MCF designs. Through optimization, we found stable discrete vortices that were capable of transferring high coherent power through the MCF.
abstract_cn: 多芯光纤（MCF）是具有高度实际意义的物理系统。 除标准开发外，MCF还可以支持离散的涡流，这些涡流携带适用于大容量光纤通信系统中的空分复用的轨道角动量。 这些离散的涡旋对于高功率激光应用也可能具有吸引力。 我们为两种实际的MCF设计提供了这种光学涡旋的存在，稳定性和相干传播的条件。 通过优化，我们发现了稳定的离散涡旋，能够通过MCF传递高相干功率。

title: Optical visualization and polarized light absorption of the single-wall carbon nanotube to verify intrinsic thermal applications
title_cn: 单壁碳纳米管的光学可视化和偏振光吸收，以验证固有的热应用
abstract: The predicted extraordinary properties of carbon nanotubes (CNTs) from theoretical calculations have great potential for many applications. However, reliable experimental determination of intrinsic properties at the single-tube level is currently a matter of concern, and many challenges remain because of the unhandled and nanoscale size of individual nanotubes. Here, we demonstrated a prototype to detect the intrinsic thermal conductivity of the single-wall carbon nanotube (SWCNT) and verify the significant non-resonant optical absorption behavior on tiny nanotubes by integrating the nanotube and ice into a new core-shell design. In particular, a reversible optical visualization method based on the individual suspended ultra-long SWCNT was first developed by wrapping a nanotube with ice in the cryogenic air environment. The light-induced thermal effect on the hybrid core-shell structure was used to melt the ice shell, which subsequently acted as a temperature sensor to verify the intrinsic thermal conductivity of the core-like nanotube. More interestingly, we successfully determined for the first time the thermal response phenomenon of the tiny absorption cross section in SWCNT in the vertical-polarization configuration and the significant non-resonant absorption behavior in the parallel-polarization configuration. These investigations will provide a better understanding for the unique optical behaviors of CNT and enable the detection of intrinsic properties of various one-dimensional nanostructures such as nanotubes, nanowires, and nanoribbons.
abstract_cn: 根据理论计算预测的碳纳米管（CNT）的非凡性能在许多应用中具有巨大潜力。然而，单管级的内在性质的可靠实验确定目前是一个令人关注的问题，并且由于各个纳米管的未处理和纳米级尺寸，仍然存在许多挑战。在这里，我们展示了一个原型，用于检测单壁碳纳米管（SWCNT）的固有热导率，并通过将纳米管和冰集成到新的核-壳设计中来验证微小纳米管上的显着非共振光学吸收行为。特别是，首先通过在低温空气环境中用冰包裹纳米管，开发了基于单个悬浮超长SWCNT的可逆光学可视化方法。利用光对混合核-壳结构的热效应来融化冰壳，冰壳随后用作温度传感器，以验证核样纳米管的固有热导率。更有趣的是，我们首次成功确定了垂直极化配置中SWCNT中微小吸收截面的热响应现象和平行极化配置中显着的非共振吸收行为。这些研究将为理解CNT的独特光学行为提供更好的理解，并能够检测各种一维纳米结构的固有特性，例如纳米管，纳米线和纳米带。

title: Exploring new avenues in high repetition rate table-top coherent extreme ultraviolet sources
title_cn: 探索高重复率台式相干极端紫外线源的新途径
abstract: The process of high harmonic generation (HHG) enables the development of table-top sources of coherent extreme ultraviolet (XUV) light. Although these are now matured sources, they still mostly rely on bulk laser technology that limits the attainable repetition rate to the low kilohertz regime. Moreover, many of the emerging applications of such light sources (e.g., photoelectron spectroscopy and microscopy, coherent diffractive imaging, or frequency metrology in the XUV spectral region) require an increase in the repetition rate. Ideally, these sources are operated with a multi-MHz repetition rate and deliver a high photon flux simultaneously. So far, this regime has been solely addressed using passive enhancement cavities together with low energy and high repetition rate lasers. Here, a novel route with significantly reduced complexity (omitting the requirement of an external actively stabilized resonator) is demonstrated that achieves the previously mentioned demanding parameters. A krypton-filled Kagome photonic crystal fiber is used for efficient nonlinear compression of 9 µJ, 250 fs pulses leading to ∼7 µJ, 31 fs pulses at 10.7 MHz repetition rate. The compressed pulses are used for HHG in a gas jet. Particular attention is devoted to achieving phase-matched (transiently) generation yielding >1013 photons s−1 (>50 µW) at 27.7 eV. This new spatially coherent XUV source improved the photon flux by four orders of magnitude for direct multi-MHZ experiments, thus demonstrating the considerable potential of this source.
abstract_cn: 高谐波产生（HHG）的过程使得能够开发台式相干极紫外（XUV）光源。尽管这些光源现在已经成熟，但它们仍然主要依赖于体激光技术，该技术将可达到的重复频率限制在低千赫兹范围内。而且，这种光源的许多新兴应用（例如，光电子能谱和显微术，相干衍射成像或XUV光谱区域中的频率计量学）都需要增加重复率。理想情况下，这些源以多MHz的重复频率运行，并同时提供高光子通量。到目前为止，仅使用无源增强腔以及低能量和高重复频率激光器来解决该问题。在这里，展示了一种新颖的途径，该途径显着降低了复杂性（省略了对外部有源稳定谐振器的要求），该途径可以实现上述苛刻的参数。填充k的Kagome光子晶体光纤用于对9＆amp; J，250 fs脉冲进行有效的非线性压缩，从而在10.7 MHz的重复频率下导致＆＃8764; 7＆＃181; J，31 fs脉冲。压缩脉冲用于气体喷射器中的HHG。尤其需要注意的是要实现相位匹配（瞬时）生成＆gt; 10 13 ＆＃160;光子＆＃160; s ＆＃8722; 1 （＆gt; 50 ＃160;＆＃181; W）在27.7＆＃160eV。这种新的空间相干XUV光源在直接多MHZ实验中将光子通量提高了四个数量级，从而证明了这种光源的巨大潜力。

title: Prediction of photothermal phase signatures from arbitrary plasmonic nanoparticles and experimental verification
title_cn: 从任意等离激元纳米粒子的光热相签名的预测和实验验证
abstract: We present a new approach for predicting spatial phase signals originating from photothermally excited metallic nanoparticles of arbitrary shapes and sizes. The heat emitted from such a nanoparticle affects the measured optical phase signal via changes in both the refractive index and thickness of the nanoparticle surroundings. Because these particles can be bio-functionalized to bind certain biological cell components, they can be used for biomedical imaging with molecular specificity, as new nanoscopy labels, and for photothermal therapy. Predicting the ideal nanoparticle parameters requires a model that computes the thermal and phase distributions around the particle, thereby enabling more efficient phase imaging of plasmonic nanoparticles and avoiding trial-and-error experiments while using unsuitable nanoparticles. The proposed nonlinear model is the first to enable the prediction of phase signatures from nanoparticles with arbitrary parameters. The model is based on a finite-volume method for geometry discretization and an implicit backward Euler method for solving the transient inhomogeneous heat equation, followed by calculation of the accumulative phase signal. To validate the model, we compared its results with experimental results obtained for gold nanorods of various concentrations, which we acquired using a custom-built wide-field interferometric phase microscopy system.
abstract_cn: 我们提出了一种预测空间相位信号的新方法，该信号来自任意形状和大小的光热激发金属纳米颗粒。从这样的纳米粒子发出的热量通过纳米粒子周围环境的折射率和厚度的变化影响所测量的光学相位信号。由于这些颗粒可以被生物功能化以结合某些生物细胞成分，因此它们可以用于具有分子特异性的生物医学成像，作为新的纳米显微镜标记以及用于光热疗法。预测理想的纳米粒子参数需要一个模型，该模型可以计算粒子周围的热和相分布，从而能够更有效地对等离子体纳米粒子进行相位成像，并避免在使用不合适的纳米粒子时进行反复试验。提出的非线性模型是第一个能够从具有任意参数的纳米粒子中预测相位特征的模型。该模型基于用于几何离散化的有限体积方法和用于求解瞬态不均匀热方程的隐式后向Euler方法，然后计算累积相位信号。为了验证该模型，我们将其结果与使用定制的宽视场干涉相显微镜系统获得的各种浓度的金纳米棒的实验结果进行了比较。
